title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, cook the pancetta until crispy.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then mix in the cheeses and pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and combine with the pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
